hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said; "I heard the Prophet delivering a khutbah and he said:'Pants (are allowed) for one who cannot find an Izar, and Khuffs for one who cannot find sandals to wear in Ihram.;;

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي لُبْسِ السَّرَاوِيلِ لِمَنْ لاَ يَجِدُ الإِزَارَ .
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Pants To Be Worn By One Who Cannot Find An Izar .
